Public Class DiagnosticListener Inherits DiagnosticSource Implements IDisposable, IObservable(Of KeyValuePair(Of String, Object))
public ref class DiagnosticListener : System::Diagnostics::DiagnosticSource, IDisposable, IObservable<System::Collections::Generic::KeyValuePair<System::String ^, System::Object ^>>
type DiagnosticListener = class inherit DiagnosticSource interface IDisposable interface IObservable<KeyValuePair<string, obj>>

summary.span: 提供抽象 类的实现，它表示源将其信息（事件）发送到的指定位置。

span.span: Provides an implementation of the abstract class that represents a named place to which a source sends its information (events).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `DiagnosticListener` 是 NotificationSource，这意味着返回的结果可用于记录通知，但它也具有 方法，因此可以任意转发通知。`DiagnosticListener` is a NotificationSource, which means the returned result can be used to log notifications, but it also has a method so notifications can be forwarded arbitrarily. 因此，其工作是将来自制造者的东西转发到所有侦听器（多转换）。Thus, its job is to forward things from the producer to all the listeners (multi-casting). 通常，您不应将自己 ，而是使用默认设置，以便通知尽可能公共。Generally, you should not be making your own but use the default, so that notifications are as public as possible. 有关 和 类的详细信息，请参阅[DiagnosticSource 用户指南](https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/blob/master/src/libraries/System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource/src/DiagnosticSourceUsersGuide.md)。For more information on the and classes, see [DiagnosticSource User's Guide](https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/blob/master/src/libraries/System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource/src/DiagnosticSourceUsersGuide.md).

summary.span: 获取此 的侦听器的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of listeners for this .

remarks.format: 当你订阅此项时，将为 appdomain 中的所有 NotificationListeners 以及过去发生的和将来创建的所有侦听器获取回调。When you subscribe to this, you get callbacks for all NotificationListeners in the appdomain, as well as those that occurred in the past, and all future Listeners created in the future.

span.span: Disposes the NotificationListeners.

remarks.span: 通知侦听器不会自行出现，因为它们位于全局列表中（用于发现）。

span.span: Notification listeners do not die on their own because they are in a global list (for discoverability).

remarks.span: 您必须显式地释放它们。

span.span: You must dispose of them explicitly.

remarks.span: 请注意，我们不会执行Dispose （bool）模式，因为我们不想支持具有非托管状态的子类。

span.span: Note that we do not do the Dispose(bool) pattern because we don't want to support subclasses that have non-managed state.

span.span: Determines whether there are any registered subscribers.

span.span: if there are any registered subscribers, otherwise.

remarks.format: 如果通知的设置成本高昂，则可以在执行此设置之前调用 `IsEnabled()`。If setup for the notification is expensive, you can call `IsEnabled()` before performing this setup. 在应用程序的性能关键部分调用 之前，创建者可以选择调用 `IsEnabled()`，以确定 是否有任何侦听器。Producers may optionally call `IsEnabled()` before calling in performance-critical parts of the application to determine whether there are any listeners to the .

param.name: observer
param.span: 订阅者。

span.span: A subscriber.

param.name: isEnabled
param.span: 一个委托，它根据事件名称和最多两个上下文对象筛选事件（可为 ），如果不需要事件筛选器，则为 。

span.span: A delegate that filters events based on their name and up to two context objects (which can be ), or to if an event filter is not desirable.

summary.span: 添加一个订阅者，根据事件名称和最多两个上下文对象筛选事件（可选）。

span.span: Adds a subscriber, and optionally filters events based on their name and up to two context objects.

returns.span: 对允许侦听器在 发送完通知前停止接收这些通知的接口的引用。

span.span: A reference to an interface that allows the listener to stop receiving notifications before the has finished sending them.

remarks.format: 如果未 `null``isEnabled`，则表明有些事件是不相关的，可跳过这些事件以提高效率。If `isEnabled` is not `null`, it indicates that some events are uninteresting can be skipped for efficiency. 特定检测站点可以选择调用一个或多个 重载，在这些重载中，它将事件的名称和其他两个（检测网站特定的）对象作为参数传递。A particular instrumentation site has the option of calling one or more overloads in which it passes the name of the event and up to two other (instrumentation site specific) objects as arguments. 如果执行这些 调用中的任何一种，则使用传递的值调用此 `isEnabled` 谓词（如果使用较短的重载，则为缺少的上下文对象传递 `null`）。If any of these calls are made then this `isEnabled` predicate is invoked with passed values (if shorter overloads are used, `null` is passed for missing context objects). 这为任何特定检测站点提供了将多达两个信息传递给订阅者的能力，以执行复杂的高效筛选。This gives any particular instrumentation site the ability to pass up to two pieces of information to the subscriber to do sophisticated, efficient filtering. 这需要检测站点和订阅服务器代码之间的更多耦合。This requires more coupling between the instrumentation site and the subscriber code. 预计特定检测站点可能会为同一事件调用不同的 `IsEnabled` 重载，首先调用 ，这将使用两个 `null` 上下文对象调用筛选器。It is expected that a particular instrumentation site may call different overloads of `IsEnabled` for the same event, first calling , which calls the filter with two `null` context objects. 如果 `isEnabled` 返回 `true`，则它将再次调用上下文对象。If `isEnabled` returns `true`, it calls again with context objects. `isEnabled` 筛选器的设计应考虑到这一点。The `isEnabled` filter should be designed with this in mind. 请注意，`isEnabled` 谓词是一个可选优化，它允许检测站点在没有订阅服务器关心的情况下避免设置负载和调用 。Note that the `isEnabled` predicate is an optional optimization to allow the instrumentation site to avoid setting up the payload and calling when no subscriber cares about it. 具体而言，检测站点可以选择忽略 谓词（不调用），只需调用 。In particular, the instrumentation site has the option of ignoring the predicate (not calling it) and simply calling . 因此，如果订阅服务器需要筛选，则需要进行筛选。Thus, if the subscriber requires the filtering, it needs to do it itself. 如果 `null`此参数，则不会执行任何筛选（ 的所有重载都返回 `true`）。If this parameter is `null`, no filtering is done (all overloads of return `true`).

summary.span: 添加一个订阅者，根据事件名称筛选事件（可选）。

span.span: Adds a subscriber, and optionally filters events based on their name.

returns.span: 对允许侦听器在 发送完通知前停止接收这些通知的接口的引用。

span.span: A reference to an interface that allows the listener to stop receiving notifications before the has finished sending them.

remarks.format: 如果未 `null``isEnabled`，则有些事件是不相关的，可跳过效率。If `isEnabled` is not `null`, some events are uninteresting and can be skipped for efficiency. `isEnabled` 谓词是一种可选优化，用于允许检测站点在没有订阅服务器关心的情况时避免设置负载和调用 。The `isEnabled` predicate is an optional optimization to allow the instrumentation site to avoid setting up the payload and calling when no subscriber cares about it. 特别是，检测站点可以选择忽略 谓词（不调用），只需调用 。In particular the instrumentation site has the option of ignoring the predicate (not calling it) and simply calling . 因此，如果订阅服务器需要筛选，则需要进行筛选。Thus if the subscriber requires the filtering, it needs to do it itself. 如果 `null``isEnabled`，则不执行任何筛选（ 的所有重载都将返回 `true`）。If `isEnabled` is `null`, no filtering is done (all overloads of return `true`).

summary.span: 添加一个订阅者，根据事件名称和最多两个上下文对象筛选事件（可选），并指定提供程序在进程外部导入或导出活动时调用的方法。

span.span: Adds a subscriber, optionally filters events based on their name and up to two context objects, and specifies methods to call when providers import or export activites from outside the process.

returns.span: 对允许侦听器在 发送完通知前停止接收这些通知的接口的引用。

span.span: A reference to an interface that allows the listener to stop receiving notifications before the has finished sending them.

remarks.format: 如果 `isEnabled` 不是 null，则可以跳过某些事件，以便提高效率。If `isEnabled` is non-null, some events are uninteresting can be skipped for efficiency. 你还可以提供 "onActivityImport" 和 "onActivityExport" 方法，当提供程序在进程外部导入或导出活动（例如，从 HTTP 请求时）时，将调用这些方法。You can also supply 'onActivityImport' and 'onActivityExport' methods that are called when providers importing or export activities from outside the process (for example, from HTTP requests). 这些方法在导入或导出活动后调用，可用于修改活动或添加策略的传出请求。These methods are called after importing or exporting the activity and can be used to modify the activity or the outgoing request to add policy.
